# rivestack_extensions (Data Source)

Lists available PostgreSQL extensions for Rivestack HA clusters.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "rivestack_extensions" "available" {}

output "extensions" {
  value = data.rivestack_extensions.available.extensions
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `extensions` (Attributes List) Available PostgreSQL extensions. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--extensions))

<a id="nestedatt--extensions"></a>
### Nested Schema for `extensions`

Read-Only:

- `category` (String) Extension category.
- `default` (Boolean) Whether this extension is installed by default.
- `description` (String) Extension description.
- `name` (String) Extension name.
